list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the art of making two- or three-dimensional representative or abstract forms, especially by carving stone or wood or by casting metal or plaster.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the boundary between painting and sculpture is displaced
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: ranh giới giữa tranh và điêu khắc được di dời

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make or represent (a form) by carving, casting, or other shaping techniques.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the choir stalls were each carefully sculptured
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các quầy hàng hợp xướng đã được điêu khắc cẩn thận
